description.value:
Your improvements in the art of conjuring your eponymous weapon has granted you the power to create a more potent, dangerous Mourneblade. This conjured weapon can utilize an existing weapon as a mould for it. With its newfound strength, it can seemingly weave and bend itself through reality. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.archetypes.Item.1MsSIas0HPgr4li8]{Distortion Blade} focus spell.

Your conjured Mourneblades also becomes more powerful. It gains the deadly d8 trait and can be thrown 15 feet instead of 10. When you conjure it, if you are holding a weapon in the Sword category, the Mourneblade can copy its material and any potency, striking or property runes it possesses. You are able to throw your Mourneblade without it dissipating, and you can summon a conjured Mourneblade to your hand once per round as a free action.

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.archetypes.Item.ZQ0NnRhCpQo5mich]{Greater Mourneblade}
